1.title: Big Belly & The Trekkies
1.plot: Pregnant bride Tracy faces the dilemma of a wedding dress that might not fit over her baby bump. Meanwhile, chapel planner Melody attempts to enlist William Shatner - aka Captain Kirk - as best man for a Trekkie wedding.

2.title: Bad Hair & A Baby Shower
2.plot: Bride Chaun is a control freak who has been planning her wedding for months and her fiancé Wes thinks it's time to relinquish the planner reigns. Will Melody get to use her talents or will Chaun drive Wes crazy on their supposed-to-be happy day?

3.title: Groomzilla & a Late Proposal
3.plot: Wedding planner Kati meets Groomzilla Allen who orders her to create a wedding with 'wow'-factor. Then, Kati psychoanalyzes a couple who's looking for a wedding package but not quite engaged yet.

4.title: Second Chance at Love
4.plot: After hearing that the groom is over $800,000 in debt, the entire chapel pulls together a surprise dream wedding for a young cancer survivor and his bride.

5.title: Chapel Anniversaries & Dancing Down the Aisle
5.plot: Chapel planner Stella coordinates a dancing ceremony and prays the couple doesn't hurt themselves with their acrobatic moves. High school sweethearts Penny and Keith renew their vows 35 years later in the same chapel.

6.title: Love Addiction & Music from the Heart
6.plot: Justin and Mel have been married for 7 years and now, along with their 2 young sons, want to renew their vows after some tumultuous times. Bride Carissa wants to surprise fiancé Matt with a heartfelt serenade during the ceremony...can she pull it off?

imdb.plot outline: Happily Ever Faster showcases the Chapel of the Flowers, a wedding chapel located in the heart of downtown Las Vegas on the famous Strip. They have five on-site wedding chapels and a complete menu of wedding services, including limousine rentals, photography and more. Despite catering to upwards of 50 couples a day, more than 5,000 couples a year, the chapel promises a classy and affordable wedding experience. Filled with tears, laughter and bridal drama, this family-owned business has its own behind-the-scenes challenges, which are tackled head on by the owners, husband and wife Jason and Holly Myers, and their upbeat and zany team of wedding planners.
imdb.title: Happily Ever Faster
plot: _Happily Ever Faster_ (qv) showcases the Chapel of the Flowers, a wedding chapel located in the heart of downtown Las Vegas on the famous Strip. They have five on-site wedding chapels and a complete menu of wedding services, including limousine rentals, photography and more. Despite catering to upwards of 50 couples a day, more than 5,000 couples a year, the chapel promises a classy and affordable wedding experience. Filled with tears, laughter and bridal drama, this family-owned business has its own behind-the-scenes challenges, which are tackled head on by the owners, husband and wife Jason and Holly Myers, and their upbeat and zany team of wedding planners.
